entry.title: State of the Budgie: 2025 In Review and Cranking Budgie Up To 11
entry.summary: 2025 was a year of significant progress for Budgie Desktop, as we finalized much of our efforts in our Wayland migration, to bring Budgie 10 to a close and enable us to focus our efforts on Budgie 11. Time to dive into our State of the Budgie to recap our efforts in 2025 and the goals for 2026.

entry.title: State of the Budgie: 2024 In Review and Goals for 2025
entry.summary: 2024 was a pivotal year for Budgie Desktop, with our Budgie 10.9 release series and our focus on our move to Wayland. Time to dive into our State of the Budgie to recap our efforts in 2024 and the goals for 2025.

entry.title: State of the Budgie: 2023 In Review and Goals for 2024
entry.summary: 2023 was an amazing year for Budgie Desktop and our organization. Time to dive into our State of the Budgie to recap our efforts in 2023 and the goals for 2024.

entry.title: State of the Budgie: 2022 In Review and Goals for 2023
entry.summary: 2022 was an incredible year for the Budgie Desktop and the Buddies of Budgie organization, with 2023 set to be even better. Let us dive into it in this special State of the Budgie to recap the happenings of 2022 and the goals for 2023.
